entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CA1416 incorrectly warning on LdapSessionOptions.SecureSocketLayer on Linux #62462
  • Extend Regex 32-bit/64-bit read optimization to IgnoreCase as well #62459
    7.0.0
  • Ping.Send buffer is not really sent on linux running as non-root #62458
  • Array interface method devirtualization #62457
  • jitdump output not accepted by ARM streamline #62456
    7.0.0
  • Interop on Mac causes process to exit with return code 0 #62454
  • Single File publishing is not compatible with Windows 7 #62453
  • Improve Regex's knowledge of captures and atomicity in the tree #62451
    7.0.0
  • Avoid RegexWriter for RegexOptions.Compiled, RegexOptions.NonBacktracking, and source generator #62450
    7.0.0
  • Improve Regex support for automatically making loops atomic #62449
    7.0.0
  • Explore using Aho-Corasick in Regex's FindFirstChar #62447
    7.0.0
  • Add Regex FindFirstChar optimization for a setloopatomic followed by a literal #62445
    7.0.0
  • Experiment with inverting Regex scan loop #62443
    7.0.0
  • Extend Regex alternation source generator optimization for backtracking #62441
    7.0.0
  • support building mono on x64 as it gets built on s390x #62440
  • Extend Regex alternation source generator optimization to small sets #62438
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Additional documentation and tooltip text to avoid full buffer returns when using ProcessStartInfo #62434
  • JIT: Optimize "static readonly valuetype" #62430
    Future
  • JsonReaderException during JSON deserialization #62427
  • [API Proposal]: Add a SHA-256 Thumbprint convenience property to X509Certificate2 #62425
  • Failed test: JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\X86Base\\Pause_r\\Pause_r.cmd #62423

Closed

  • Assertion failed '(op3Reg != targetReg) || (op1Reg == targetReg)' during 'Generate code' #62267
  • Fastest Possible Reverse String faster then using Array.Reverse. #62442
  • Investigate how to improve libraries incremental build for faster innerloop development #62444
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add JsonConverter with simple string to type serialization #62406
  • Regex optimization opportunities #1349
    Future
  • Several .NET 5 assemblies are deployed without matching PDBs in MS Symbol Server #60123
  • [API Proposal]: ImmutableCollection AddOrReplace #62408
  • [wasm] browser-bench appstart is broken on main #62357
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Implicitely convert IEnumerable to ImmutableArray (and friends) #62409
  • Deadlock due to managed code execution while holding the loader lock #62419
  • Test failure Interop\\PInvoke\\Vector2_3_4\\Vector2_3_4\\Vector2_3_4.cmd #61579
    7.0.0
  • microsoft.extensions.logging.generators.roslyn3.11.tests work item #62238
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Intrinsics\\CreateSpan_il\\CreateSpan_il.cmd #62312
    7.0.0
  • Testing issue triage automation -- please disregard #62246
  • WebDav directory enumeration via WebClient service returns spurious null characters #62429
  • [API Proposal]: Since we can run source code in visual studio, why don't we make running from source code a thing #62424

PullRequests

Created

  • More cleanup for source generator #62461
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Renaming some local variables to make the generated code more readable #62460
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Symlink for dotnet host should be created at build time #62455
    area-Setup, 7.0.0
  • App does not Run as a service in a Windows Container #62452
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Reenable Mono llvmaot runtime tests on PRs #62437
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add ConstantExpectedAttribute #62436
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • CI matrix: Add windows 20H2 - fix TLS1.3 issue #62435
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Reduce number of calls to setTimer #62433
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [wasm] Add support for running debugger tests CI #62431
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fixing a possible null reference error in WebSocket deflate. #62428
    area-System.Net, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix the presence of managed build logs on Windows #62446
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Some more Regex cleanup and optimization (mostly source generator) #62426
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • error C2665: 'CorSigUncompressData': none of the 3 overloads could convert all the argument types #60967
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] load dotnet.js with import in tests #62415
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Disable Rollup warning for use of eval #62432
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Clarifying a comment in genFMAIntrinsic #62439
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revise the Regex description output in source #62369
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix SuperPMI unit test 'strip' behavior #62373
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure that FMA codegen operand swapping matches the lsra selections #62382
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] benchmark sample modularized #62395
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][wasm] Fix an issue with the passing of small vtypes. #62400
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Work around the browser having a lower timer resolution than the #62411
    arch-wasm, area-System.Diagnostics-mono
  • Filter blocks to be used for hiding alignment instruction #62262
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move FabricBot rules to Config-As-Code #62297
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] force versioned dotnet.d.ts to always have unix style end of line #62418
    arch-wasm

Updated

  • Switch over Loader/classloader/TypeGeneratorTests to use merged wrappers #61942
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Ensure all types are loaded when methods are accessed as function pointers #62158
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add Runtime portion of android startup scenario #61861
  • Expose Comment in ZipArchive and ZipArchiveEntry #59442
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Use SIMD operations in InitBlkUnroll/CopyBlkUnroll and increase unroll limit up to 128 bytes #61030
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Change all "unmanaged" (no GC fields) sequential types to have sequential layout. #61759
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Switch over miscellaneous DllImports to GeneratedDllImport. #62353
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Add 'w' and 's' bit to xarch instruction flags. #61198
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Delete `gtEvalSizeFirst` #62330
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix a case of hang while allocating at LOH boundary #62355
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix BigInteger.Parse returns bogus value for exponents above 1000 #55397
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [arm64] JIT: X % 2 == 0 -> X & 1 == 0 #62399
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: refactor arm64 epilog generation #62381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update libunwind to v1.6.2 #62092
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Accelerate additional cross platform hardware intrinsics #61649
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Directory.Delete: prefer DirectoryNotFoundException over UnauthorizedAccess IOException. #62396
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Add RegexGenerator to System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter. #62325
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] View object attributes - DebugType=full #62278
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove #ifs in System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter #62364
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [mono] Make some icalls return objects using an extra ObjectHandleOnS… #62141
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Enable memory-mapped stress log on cross platform #61123
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Including FastFloat in parsing process #62301
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix Some Date and Time parsing cases #62376
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • Baseline System.Speech for trimming errors #61874
    linkable-framework, area-System.Speech, community-contribution
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 #61934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support Process.Start() on MacCatalyst #61507
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • [release/6.0] Cache LastAccessed during MemoryCache compaction #62286
    * NO MERGE *, Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Caching, 6.0.2
  • Prototype mark overflow fix for regions #60646
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add additional binary operations into the RangeCheck analysis. #61662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Convert System.DirectoryServices.Protocols and System.Drawing.Common to use GeneratedDllImport #62365
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Change OperIsBlkOp test to check for store block operators #60878
    needs more info, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Port MD4 managed implementation from mono/mono #62074
    area-System.Security
  • Optimize System.Diagnostics.TraceSource #60464
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, needs more info, community-contribution
  • [wasm] updated samples for ES6 and CJS #62292
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • [WIP]: Fix broken callstacks in interpreter on MonoVM. #60338
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • CI matrix update: add Ubuntu 21.04 - second attempt #60162
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix: add openSUSE 15.2 - second attempt #60161
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Android] Prevent potential out of bounds write on Android #62275
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • [wasm][debugger] Add Browsable Attribute support. #62045
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: handle more cases for MOD/DIV -> UMOD/UDIV transformation #62394
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Detect truncated GZip streams #61768
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for mobile runtime tests #60879
  • Fix time-of-use vs. time-of-check "bugs" #60860
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ensure the JIT view of InstructionSets is correct in the face of JitConfig switches #62420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix FileSystemAclExtensions.Create when passing a null FileSecurity #61297
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Missing delegate marshalling data for MMI #1770

PullRequests

Created

  • Move new System.Native shim methods out of pal_environment #1769
    area-NativeAOT

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM]: Initial support for CT_INDIRECT #1768

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet sln add doesn't support shared projects #22921
  • Support dotnet list reference --include-transitive #22909

Closed

  • .NET 6 RC2 Update for macOS and Windows Arm64 #21686
  • dotnet run on macOS UX -- x64 emulation #20584
  • package.config and *.csproj tag warnning #22907

PullRequests

Created

  • Re-enable Skipped Blazor Wasm Tests #22920
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improve error message for path mismatch #22919
    Area-Infrastructure
  • include props and targets for code style packages #22918
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #22917
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update .vsts-ci-richnav.yml #22916
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Transformed --arch switch to --platform for dll tests container scenario #22912
    Area-DotNet Test

Merged

  • Update build.yml for loc build #22922
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update build.yml to change the loc build to target .2xx #22835
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch to Ubuntu 1804 #22875
  • Change -a parameter to be shorthand for --arch, instead of --test-adapter-path #22898
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-DotNet Test
  • Transform --arch switch to --platform for dll tests container scenario #22897
    Area-DotNet Test

Updated

  • Merge 6.0.1xx into the 6.0.2xx branch to catch it up to current #22861
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add test retry #21186
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improvements to unused value analyzer and code fixes #58141
  • Code Cleanup and Run Code Analysis should be hidden when no solution is loaded #58138
  • "Implement all members explicitly" action generates wrong code for static interface properties #58136
    17.1
  • cw snippet adds global::System.Console when i use it on lambda expressions. #58135
  • Intellisense suggesting code improvement not supported for the project's C# version #58133
  • Warnlevel 6 warnings were not documented #58132
  • Rename doesn't work on methods passed as parameters #58131
  • Unable to use external libraries in source generators #58130
  • Code Analysis tooling issues with editorconfig #58129
  • Proposal: Combine overload for IncrementalValuesProvider<T> #58127

Closed

  • Intellisense tooltip should show docs from <exception> tag. #58140
  • C# code snippet for region violating document EOL sequence #58134
  • CS8073 false possitive for linq to SQL #57852
  • Question: Global using support for `CSharpCompilationOptions` #58119

PullRequests

Created

  • Update publishdata.json to point to correct VS branch #58142
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58139
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • BoundDecisionDag.Rewrite - Avoid capturing the replacement map #58137
    Area-Compilers, Community

Merged

  • Skip correct TestLargeStringConcatenation test #58058
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, Test, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58066
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #58125
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58126
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Lazy load ISourceLinkService to reduce DLL loads #58108
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58124
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58123
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58144
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58143
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Avoid calculating inferred delegate type unnecessarily in conversions and type inference #58115
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • Report a level 7 warning for lower-cased type names #56905
    Area-Compilers
  • Use !! in AddParameterCheck refactoring #57934
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers
  • Make scripting work in single-file deployments #57910
    Area-Interactive, Community
  • Add support for nullable analysis in interpolated string handler constructors #57780
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement Naming Styles for editorconfig UI #58075
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers
  • Use `ldlen` to get array's Length during pattern-matching. #58114
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, New Feature - Extended Property Patterns, 17.1
  • Adjust doc comment for `SyntaxFactory.ParseTokens` API #58064
    Area-Compilers
  • Handling defaults provided by IAsyncCompletionDefaultsSource #57685
    Area-IDE
  • Allow xml docs to still be created when 'emit metadata only' is on. #57667
    Area-Compilers
  • Add external access to stacktrace APIs for Unit Testing #58082
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: Skip compiler-generated dag nodes for better codegen #57909
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Run builds with $TempDir redirected to a new drive #58105
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.1
  • Method group conversion caching redo #57882
    Area-Compilers, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 6 - Blazor Server Side: RemoteJSDataStream NullReferenceException BUG #38854
  • Custom Request-Id for client side requests #38850
  • [Perf] Plaintext regression compared to 6.0 #38848
  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #38847
  • Instruction pointer stays in commented out code after hot reload #38846
  • Blazor SDK Targets Packaging Fixes #38844
    7.0-preview1
  • FileUpload: Did not receive any data in the allotted time. #38842
  • Dynamic sub-app path for a multi-tenant Blazor Server app #38841
  • dotnet watch run not work properly (net core 6) #38845

Closed

  • In Blazor, load a page inside a page #38849
  • Nullable=Enabled results in required validation errors for parameters or bound properties with default values #18403
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Bug with controller action which has a parameter named "index" and an IEnumerable parameter #28603
    Backlog
  • Blazor WASM application Hangs on MSAL Authentication #38653
  • Blazor: Refreshing page throws error when using JavaScript modules #38822
  • Unmarshalled calls with arrays is much slower with WASM 6.0.0 #38510
  • Virtualize: Accessibility (scrolling by keyboard) is broken when using ItemsProvider #38020
    7.0-preview1
  • Document Blazor Virtualize component internal details and the behaviors it results in #29123
    7.0-preview1
  • Razor `@for` statement causes unexpected behavior when loop variable affects a `ChildContent` parameter #38836

PullRequests

Created

  • Using DictionaryKeyPolicy during ProblemDetails.Errors conversion to JSON #38853
  • StatusCodes doc: Mention GetReasonPhrase in remarks #38852
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Support overriding AuthorizeFilter.OnAuthorizationAsync(context) in more cases #38851
    area-mvc
  • StringOutputFormatter doc: explain how it works #38843
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • PageResult doc: Describe ExecuteResultAsync #38840
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Merged

  • Avoiding Inferred required attribute when default value is defined #38801
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Bump .NET SDK again #38506
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `e2f3978` to `d61d4d8` #38838
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • ContentResult doc: add links to properties #38828
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • HTTP/3: QPACK decoder performance #38826
    area-runtime
  • LdapAdapter: Keep track of already processed groups to account for circular references #38817
    area-security, community-contribution
  • HTTP/2: Improve incoming header performance #38834
    area-runtime
  • Upgrade Playwright #38414
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Add support for GitHub Codespaces prebuilds #38793
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • spurious Carriage-Return (Control M) in linux output #2728
    Future
  • dotnet trace collect does not preserve instrumented application's stdout #2729
    .NET 7.0

Updated

  • Add source file names and line numbers to the output of dotnet-stack #2776
    .NET 7.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • dotnet-trace collect --show-child-io displays child process' IO only #2774
    dotnet-trace

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • OpenAPI CodeGen #3679
  • Geolocation - Listening for location changes in the foreground #3678
  • BlazorWebView on MAUI Android doesn't use custom file provider override #3676
  • Access controls inside DataTemplate #3675
  • IContentView measure and arrange getting called continuously for same values #3670
  • What is the method of moving the mouse over a control？ #3669

PullRequests

Created

  • Async Cancellation For WebView #3681
  • Disable Interpretor for templates #3680
    do-not-merge
  • [DnM] Setting FontFamily on iOS is currently broken #3677
    do-not-merge
  • Bump JDK to JDK 11 #3674
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • Use android listener and TaskCompletionSource instead of starting new task #3671
  • Item Template updates for C# 10isms #3659
    area/templates 📄
  • Added missing references #3640
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3666
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [android] reduce JNI calls by moving logic into Java #3372
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Add BlazorWebView device tests and fix Android file provider bug #3612
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄
  • Implement CursorPosition in IEditor/ITextInput Handlers #3196
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, 6.0.200-preview.11

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Does Compiled models work when using Lazy loading without proxies? #26917
  • EF.Functions.Like always fails after VS2022 HOT RELOAD is applied #26914
  • Segmentation Fault On CentOS 7.9.2009 #26913
  • Unable to convert a queryable method to an enumerable method. #26912
  • Old cached query executing against database when using LINQ .Contains in traffic heavy environment #26905
  • Can't map Dictionary<string,object> to JSON #26903

Closed

  • Cosmos : Need an option to inject/reuse external `CosmosClient` during the setup of EF Core Azure Cosmos DB Provider #26863
  • Collection of type that has custom ValueConverter it's not supported (Cosmos) #26881
  • Scaffolding: UserRole1 instead of UserRoles with --use-database-names (for net5.0 runtime) #26901
  • EFCore 6 InMemory throw exception on ignored type lookup #26731
    7.0.0
  • Applying type mappings in translators #26891
  • Is there a good reason why support for cascading updates has not been added? #26894
  • Huge amount of TaskCanceledException being logged #26884
  • Ask EF Core to provide a method of replacing parameterization in generating SQL statements #26880
  • EF core 6.0 obtain parents from children filter #26902
  • How to make a database able to use migrations, in code, after it was created using EnsureCreate #26870
  • DeleteBehavior.Restrict Consistency Question #26857
  • System.InvalidOperationException: Unable to translate a collection subquery in a projection... using Union or Concat #26703
  • EF incorrectly sets "Precision" instead of "Scale" on "VarTime" data types in EFCore.SqlServer #26742
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Static analysis: Use ??= #26916
  • Static analysis: conditional cleanup #26915
  • Static analysis: using declarations and await using #26911
  • Static analysis: use range indexer and index from end #26910

Merged

  • Don't discover navigations to Dictionary<> and non-owned STETs #26769
  • Static analysis: remove trailing commas #26906
  • Static analysis: use char instead of string literals #26907
  • Tiny cleanup #26904
  • Automatic refactorings based on static analysis of EFCore project #26806
  • test and fix for Issue #26742 #26758
    community-contribution

Updated

  • Fixup navigations to/from join entity when new many-to-many relationship is created #26853
  • [6.0.2] Detach join entity when removing added relationship #26892
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-06
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #12751

Merged

  • source-build changes to support release/6.0.2xx #12750
  • Update release/6.0.1xx build machines #12748

Updated

  • Re-enable web https smoke tests #12739
